attributes.action: Remove John Terry as the captain of England in view of recent revelations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Terry as the captain of England is meant to be a role model for hundreds of thousands of youngsters. The recent publicity surrounding this supposed "father of the year" is an absolute embarrasment. Please can the PM pressure Mr Capello and also the FA to do what is right and remove him from his captains duties. Thank-you

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
